conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model presents a consistent isometric cutaway perspective with clear floor and wall separation.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D transformation with consistent wall heights and clear interior volumes. The isometric angle effectively displays the space.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major layout matches 2D plan. Some doors and internal partitions are simplified or shifted slightly, though room adjacencies remain correct.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is highly accurate to the references in the floor plan, including living area layout and kitchen utilities.

visual_clarity.notes: Excellent rendering quality with clean geometry. The model is highly readable with no UI/text interference.

detected_errors.description: Minor door orientation and window sizing differences compared to the specific icons in the 2D plan.

summary: A high-fidelity 3D conversion that accurately preserves the room configuration and furniture layout of the architectural plan with one of the most consistent rendering styles observed.
